I travel and work in Asia regularly and I've been looking for dress shirts made from performance fabrics. I've tried some of the pricier ones and am looking for something less expensive. I ordered the white and the light blue. While there is much to like about this shirt, I'll be sending them both back.  The Good. - Nice weight. Not too heavy and the fabric feels good. - Nice fit. I'm a 16.5" neck and the large fit me well with not a lot of loose fabric. - Good color on the light blue.  Why I'm sending them back. - The collar is unstructured. It has no collar stays and the edge of collar isn't well defined. - With a tie on, the collar is wrinkled and does not hold its shape. - Under a suit coat, the collar rolls and is wrinkled. - I'm not a fan of the hidden buttons.  Bottom line. - This is a nice long sleeved sport shirt but doesn't work well as a dress shirt if you need to wear a coat and/or tie.

评论概述: Good loose shirt just not a fan of this...

This is a sleek dress shirt that is great for going out or for business attire. I have worn this shirt several times and the fit is great. It is a well designed shirt that has a modern style. I will admit that I miss pockets but that is just because I have to wear badges for my job. Other than that, I can attest that the shirt fits extremely well and the wrinkle free claim stands up as long as you get it out of the dryer in a reasonable amount of time.

very nice shirt

This is a very nice button down shirt and I love the purple. My husband wasn't thrilled with my choice of color at first but he actually likes it. He says the shirt is soft and comfortable, fits well but doesn't like that you can't see the buttons. It's quality made, looks good, and is comfortable. I think it would look better if you could see the buttons.

I love this shirt. It’s very soft and comfortable. It has a stretch to it so moving around is comfortable. It also has a cover that hides the buttons in the front. It maintains me cool while I wear it as well. It’s performed really well. I just wish it has a little more length so that it wouldn’t come untuck when I need to bend over. So don’t if you’re tall like me just be aware of that. Otherwise it looks nice with it just been untuck.

This is a nice and comfortable button down / long sleeve shirt. The fabric is soft and it washes well. It has a flap to cover the buttons which I am not excited about because it could end up curling a bit but hasn't yet with washing it. Fits as expected and I like the purple color. Overall very pleased with the shirt and I would recommend.

评论概述: Not fond of the hidden button front
评论详情: I had high hopes for this shirt but the hidden button front is just too off-putting for me. The material itself is soft and the shirt fits well. Not a fitted shirt by any means, more of a traditional fit. When my wife saw the hidden button front, she remarked that that's what a lot of women's button up shirts look like. That was enough for me. I can't see myself wearing it unless I'm in a pinch. Maybe with a tie covering that, you wouldn't notice as much. Overall, the quality of the shirt is great.
Gave this a quick go with my portable steamer and it looks amazing. Very nice and has a flattering fit.

This is a good shirt.  It is well made, had no loose threads, had buttons sewn on well.  The fit was as expected (I order a large shirt; I'm 6' tall and weigh 175 pounds.)  Most important to me--the shirt came out of the dryer without wrinkles.  I could not tell for sure in the ad whether the shirt was wrinkle resistant or wrinkle free--I am very happy it's the latter.My only complaint (that missing fifth star) is that the fabric is very light.  I use long sleeve shirts in the winter, and I like a heavier fabric to keep me a little warmer.  This is strictly a personal opinion, so if light material doesn't bother you or you plan to wear it under a jacket or sweater when it's cold, this is a great shirt to consider.

评论概述: Very Comfortable Fit and Sharp Design
评论详情: I was skeptical about this shirt because it isn't measured by arm length and neck size. However, I was pleasantly surprised to find it fit me perfectly. The material is soft yet seems wrinkle-resistant, and the flap covering the buttons adds something extra to this shirt. I really like it and recommend it to you if you are in the market for this style of shirt.

I am a science teacher and sometimes I like to look nice for my class. I got this Men's dress shirt from Coofandy in "purple" medium. It fits me well. It's a little loose in the neck and shoulders, and has a little stretch to it which helps cover my not-so-medium middle. I got this because of the "invisible button" style (the flap that covers the buttons.) It has a modest collar length.  This is a unique color. It's purple, but... almost more maroon than straight purple.  It has a light feel and resists wrinkling which is helpful. It's 63% polyester, 34% viscose, and 3% spandex and safe for machine wash. They recommend line dry, but I've run it through the dryer without issues.  It has a fabric brand tag high on the collar, which I will probably cut off since I don't like things rubbing on my neck. the sleeves have a usual pair of buttons for loose or tight cuff fit.  I'm happy with this shirt. My wife likes it (thought not with jeans) on me as well. It's a bit on the loose side, which is what I like. If you're between sizes, definitely order down.

Got this shirt in a medium for my hubby. This is the size he typically wears. The variety of colors is nice, but I choose the purple color as he tends to learn towarrds maroon colors these days. The purple color is like a "dusty maroon" - pretty much like the photos show. The material is soft and lightweight. it's a good quality and hubby liked the hidden button front, because he rarely wears a tie and this makes for a more professional look when wearing with slacks. It also makes this shirt great for wearing with a suit, but can easily be dressed down with jeans, too.  The medium fit him well, the arms a bit long, but his reach is shorter than "average" so this is expected. it's also not as fitted in the waist as he usually prefers, but it's not real baggy so it works well for him. This is a great addition to his wardrobe.

The shirt fabric feels smooth and comfortable to wear it. The size is accurate and fits me perfectly with some slack. The blue color looks very nice on me and feels cool as well. I love the wrinkle free feature, no need to iron and still looks good. The hidden button feature looks good and gives it a clean and simpler look. Overall, this is a good looking shirt and I recommend it.

Perfect shirt for work or school. It fits great, and the collar is nice and even. I like how the buttons are hidden so it will fit great with a tie and a suit. the length is a bit short, but you are tucking it in the pants anyway, so it is not a big deal. The shoulders are even and the shirt sits very well so you can wear it alone or with a jacket.
Not a bad shirt at all. Nice color, silky but has a nice touch on the skin. Not easily wrinkled up, a decent shirt.

评论概述: Comfortable and stretchy shirt - hidden buttons is nice feature
评论详情: I like this shirt. It's comfortable and stretches just enough to not bind when I move. Collar stands up pretty well and doesn't sag or flop around. The hidden buttons is a nice touch. It adds some interest to the design. This shirt can be dressed up or down. I can wear it with dress pants and a blazer or with jeans and a sweater. I am 5’10” inches (178cm) tall and weigh 175lbs (80kg). The medium size fits me well. It is definitely slim fit, so if you have a bit of a belly, this may not be the shirt for you.

评论概述: Great shirt, but a little long
评论详情: This shirt was really good quality.  I like that the buttons are hidden behind a flap.  It came free of wrinkles, and after a wash and dryer it was still free of wrinkles.  I love that I don't have to iron it!  The material is comfortable to wear and is breathable.  The only downside is that the shirt is a little big overall.  Normally, a medium fits perfect (around the chest and arm length).  This shirt was too loose around the chest, and the sleeves were a couple of inches too long.  If I had to get one again, I would get the small size.

This fit me well and has a really nice material. I feel like once it is ironed it doesn't wrinkle too easily. I like the hidden buttons. I made a mistake and ordered it in dark gray- the color didn't suit me. I should have gotten a lighter color- but that's my own fault. The shirt is really nice.

评论概述: Really comfortable and looks like it cost a lot more
评论详情: This shirt looks like it cost a lot more than it did. It is really soft, fits nicely over my “spare tire”, and moves with me as I move. The hidden buttons add to its neat and sophisticated appearance. I’ll be buying more of them shortly!

I can always use an extra white dress shirt in my wardrobe. This one is a pretty good weight. I think it will wrinkle easily but that's okay because I always iron before wearing a fancy shirt. I am not a huge fan of the hidden buttons on the front of the shirt. It makes it look like a tuxedo shirt in a way. If I wear it with a tie it will not be an issue. But I am not sure if I would wear it without a tie. The fit is good. I got an extra large and I am approximately 5 9 and 190 lb.
a good looking shirt.  I like the button sleeve, makes for a nice clean look.

Fits well and I am a 16.5 neck 34/35 sleeve. It's a little big in the neck so maybe it would fit best on someone with a size 16 neck.  Hidden buttons in the front.  The fabric is ok but not too thick.

My previous shite dress shirt got a stain so I figured I can give this one a shot. On initial try on I did like the fit as it wasn't too baggy nor was it tight on my chest. The only problem I did have with this shirt is the ability to see through it easily. I would ensure you have an undershirt with this thing or else others can likely see everything underneath.  Overall, I think I'm going to stick with using this on special occasions where I can wear a suit jacket with it and besides the thinness of the shirt I like everything else about it (e.g. color, fit, feeling of the material, etc.)

I know from past experience that ordering shoes, pants, shirts, online is generally a dart board throw to get a bullseye on size & fit, but for me with XL worked just fine in all directions.  The shirt looks nice and the material was of decent thickness compared to others which were much thinner.  I got the light Grey and the color was very nice and uniform.  For me, I am very pleased with the look, feel, fit, and material thickness of this shirt.

Feels nice enough, but it was immediately apparent this is meant for someone with...I don't know. Not my physique. I bought a medium and generally fit medium shirts pretty well, but the arms were very baggy and the fit was immediately awkward.  I'm sure I could get it tailored or something but I'll just be donating it.

评论概述: Hard to know with sizing and came with wrinkles
评论详情: Most mens formal shirts are sized by sleeve length and neck size so I wasn't really sure what size to buy here but the medium generally seems fine for my son.  It says wrinkle free but came with lots of wrinkles so certainly does need to be ironed.  The collar does not have openings for collar-stays which I know some people like to use also, so if that's important for you don't get this shirt.  Material is soft though and am sure it will be comfortable to wear.

评论概述: Comfortable and stylish, fit is a bit small
评论详情: I'm a big guy, but a 3XL generally fits me.  I ordered this in a 3XL and it was too small.  It's a very nice shirt - the material is soft and it is very stylish.  Just make sure you get a size up from your regular.

I am a healthy son too expend. His wardrobe so I purchased this shirt. I like the shirt, it is a button down. It has a nice start caller to it and nicely that you can unbutton and roll up if you need to. The color itself is kind of like a charcoal Gray, which looks a great on my son's skintone. And the material is nice and soft. I plan on buying more shirts like this in different colors. This can be used a casual shirt. Or if you need to, you can pair it with a pair of slacks and a can be a business casual look. Highly recommend... 5 out of 5.
This is a nice enough shirt. It fits nicely, but it is quite thin and see through, and it doesn’t stretch at all. I’m no dress shirt expert, but this is probably not worth the asking price.

Nice shirt, nice details.  Sizing was good.  Touch iron only required right out of 2 minute dryer cycle.
